name: Tribalpunk Cryptoverse
description: Tribalpunk: Cryptoverse is an Idle/ RPG Collectible Card Game mixed with NFT technology. It was once released on Android/ iOS under the name of Tribal Punk - now modified with blockchain and turned into a fresh product in order to tackle the uprising NFT Gaming Market Similar to the company other game titleâ€™s like Jump Ball: Tiles and Beats, Mahjong Blossom, Spider Solitaire, Tribalpunk: Cryptoverse maintains a near-perfect overall review rating from its users. The game has also rocketed to going to pass over 10K downloads after its release and has topped charts in several countries as well.
